"I'm sorry, I'm having difficulty connecting to the remote control. Can you please check if it's turned on and within range?"
"I'm having trouble finding the right channel on the remote control. Can you please tell me which channel you want me to switch to?"
"I'm sorry, I can't seem to turn on the TV using the remote control. Can you please try holding down the power button for a few seconds and then turning it on again?"
"I'm having trouble navigating the remote control. Can you please tell me which button you want me to press to go to the next page?"
"I'm sorry, I can't seem to control the volume on the TV using the remote control. Can you please try turning it off and then turning it back on again?"
